<h3 id="X38123">X(38123) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(3), X(7), X(10)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*(b+c)*a^5-(3*b^2-14*b*c+3*c^2)*a^4-2*(b+c)*(3*b^2+2*b*c+3*c^2)*a^3+6*(b^2+c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^2+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(3*b^2+2*b*c+3*c^2)*a-3*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38123) = X(7)+2*X(6684) = X(10)+2*X(31657) = 3*X(10)-2*X(38175) = 4*X(142)-X(946) = X(144)-7*X(31423) = 5*X(631)+X(4312) = 2*X(5805)+X(31730) = 3*X(10165)-2*X(38031) = 2*X(12512)+X(31671) = 3*X(21151)+X(38149) = 3*X(31657)+X(38175) = X(38030)-3*X(38065) = X(38031)-3*X(38122) = 2*X(38041)-3*X(38054) = X(38041)-3*X(38111) = 3*X(38052)-X(38149) = 3*X(38065)+X(38121) = 3*X(38068)-2*X(38130) = 3*X(38094)-X(38151) = 3*X(38094)-2*X(38172)</b>
<p>X(38123) lies on these lines: {3,142}, {7,6684}, {10,31657}, {30,38094}, {144,31423}, {226,21168}, {511,38187}, {515,21151}, {517,38041}, {518,38127}, {519,38030}, {527,38068}, {631,4312}, {758,38125}, {952,38201}, {971,10175}, {1698,36996}, {2550,5882}, {2802,38124}, {2951,18483}, {3059,12005}, {3062,3090}, {3339,5657}, {3452,38113}, {3634,5779}, {3817,10156}, {3826,31399}, {4208,5587}, {5542,11362}, {5732,31673}, {5762,10164}, {5785,38057}, {5817,6260}, {5840,38207}, {5843,11231}, {5845,38118}, {5847,38115}, {5850,26446}, {5851,38133}, {5852,38134}, {6937,10392}, {8728,9948}, {9940,15587}, {10265,10427}, {11038,11526}, {11200,24181}, {13464,35514}, {19883,38043}, {28146,38137}, {28194,38036}, {28198,38080}, {28204,38170}, {30424,31658}, {38037,38093}</p>
<p>
X(38123) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {21151, 38052}, {38030, 38121}<br>
X(38123) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3817, 38171), (5817, 10172), (10165, 38122), (10175, 38204), (38054, 38111), (38151, 38172)<br>
X(38123) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (38065, 38121, 38030), (38094, 38151, 38172)<br>
</p>
